Description: A bug in Inxi.NET caused unrooted Android devices to fail to start up KS with JSON errors. This bug is fixed, but not ported over to KS yet. As a workaround, copy the latest Inxi.NET files (2022.3.1.2) to the same path as the Kernel Simulator executable.
Inxi.NET throws JSON errors on unrooted Android devices instead of getting device information. Fixed at version 2022.3.1.2 and tested with Android 13 and an unrooted Samsung Galaxy Tab S8.
